docs.text: HowTo from steam import SteamScraper scraper = SteamScraper() Search term = "banana" ls = scraper.get_search(term) scraper.write_csv(scraper.get_links_details(ls), f"{term}_steam_search.csv") Search by Publisher term = "Sky" ls = scraper.get_publisher(term) scraper.write_csv(scraper.get_links_details(ls), f"{term}_steam_publisher.csv") Search by Developer term = "Sky" ls = scraper.get_developer(term) scraper.write_csv(scraper.get_links_details(ls), f"{term}_steam_publisher.csv") Search by Similar term = 2923300 ls = scraper.get_similar(term) scraper.write_csv(scraper.get_links_details(ls), f"{term}_steam_similar.csv")
